contentrichtext.text: {{Sidebar |name = Scandinavia |bodystyle = width:18.0em; |topimage = [[File:Scandinavia M2002074 lrg.jpg|175px|Snow cover across Scandinavia, as imaged by MODIS on board NASA's Terra satellite in 2002]] |pretitle = This article is part of [[:Category:Scandinavia|a series]] on |titlestyle = font-size:200%;font-weight:normal; |title = [[Scandinavia]] |headingstyle = padding:0.1em 0.1em 0.1em;background:gainsboro; |contentclass = hlist |contentstyle = padding:0.2em 0.2em 0.6em; |heading1 = Geography |content1 = *[[Scandinavian Mountains|Mountains]] *[[Scandinavian Peninsula|Peninsula]] |heading2 = [[Viking Age]] |content2 = *[[Old Norse]] *[[Viking]] *''[[Thing (assembly)|Thing]]'' *[[Norse mythology|Mythology]] *[[Christianization of Scandinavia|Christianization]] *[[Northern Arc (trade route)|Northern Arc]] |heading3 = Political entities |content3 = *[[Denmark–Norway]] *[[Sweden–Finland]] *[[Union between Sweden and Norway|Sweden–Norway union]] |heading4 = [[History of Scandinavia|History]] |content4 = *[[History of Denmark|Denmark]] *[[History of Finland|Finland]] *[[History of Norway|Norway]] *[[History of Sweden|Sweden]] *[[History of Iceland|Iceland]] |heading5 = Other topics |content5 = *[[North Germanic languages|Languages]] *[[Scandinavism]] *[[Nordic Council]] *[[Scandinavian Monetary Union|Monetary Union]] *[[Scandinavian defence union|Defence Union]] *[[Scandinavian Airlines]] }}<noinclude> {{documentation}} </noinclude>
